paper_abstract: Any amicable pair phi, psi of Sturmian morphisms enables a construction of a ternary morphism eta which preserves the set of infinite words coding 3-interval exchange. We determine the number of amicable pairs with the same incidence matrix in SL +/-(2, N) and we study incidence matrices associated with the corresponding ternary morphisms eta.
paper_title: MORPHISMS PRESERVING THE SET OF WORDS CODING THREE INTERVAL EXCHANGE
